{{Schematic | caption =

'''AND-Gate Mux'''

The C input is one block higher than the A and B inputs.

| style = display: inline-block; float: none; vertical-align: text-top;

|input+A|rd-ew+SB-u|SB+rt-d!|SB+rd-ew!|rt-w|rd-sw||-
|input+darker+C|SB+rd-ew|SB+rr-e1|SB-u|rt-w!|rd-nse|output+rd-ew|-
|input+B|rd-ew+SB-u|rd-ew+SB-u|SB+rt-d!|SB+rd-nw!|rt-w||-

}}

{{Schematic | caption =

'''Horizontal Dust-Cut Mux'''

The C input is one block higher than the A and B inputs.

| style = display: inline-block; float: none; vertical-align: text-top;

|input+A|rd-ew|ts+rd-ew|SB+rd-sw||-
|input+darker+C|sp-e|rd-ew+MB-u|rd-new|output+rd-ew|-
|input+B|rd-ew|SB+rd-ew||

}}

{{Schematic | caption =

| style = display: inline-block; float: none; vertical-align: text-top;

|rd-ns||sp-s|||-
|SB|rr-e1|MB|rd-se|output+rd-ew|-
|SB|rr-e1||rd-ns||-
|rd-ns|||||-
|input+B||||

}}
